item.title: Failures
item.description: I have had a fair share of failures in my life. Most of what I try fails, but these failures never got the required visibility. People often fail to realize that the world is stochastic and it is not just successes in one’s life. This page is an attempt to restore the balance between the two parts of the coin in my life. This idea is not mine. Recently I read the excellent article in Nature, written by Melanie I.

item.title: whoami
item.description: Hi there, I am Yash (y-uh-sh) ðŸ‘‹. I am a computer programmer interested in network security, cryptography, and distributed systems. I work as a Software Engineer at Cisco Systems in Bangalore. I am interested in tech, economics, books, writing, history and philosophy. As an introvert, I do not like to talk a lot in public spaces, but one to one is always an option. Contact me for anything and I will be more than happy to help.
